title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 182.10 - Procedural requirements for incidental take permit applications and related matters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 182.10 - Procedural requirements for incidental take permit applications and related matters

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the provisions of Part 175 of this Title, the application for incidental take permits and related matters including: departmental action on permit applications; public notice and comment
procedures; final decisions on applications; renewals, modifications, suspensions or revocations of incidental take permits by the department; and
special provisions relating to incidental take permits shall utilize the
procedures found in Part 621 of this Title (Uniform Procedures). Copies of
forms and regulations referred to in this Part are available from the
department's regional permit administrators at the locations listed in section
621.19 of Part 621 of this Title and on the department's internet
site. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

182.10

York State Register December 4, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 49, eff. 12/4/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
